timeline.message:
Merge pull request #1 from checkstyle/master

update req.
Issue #7653: Updated doc for NestedTryDepth pull: #7704

timeline.bodyText: Please remove redundant comments like // on Exception or // ...
timeline.author: strkkk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -48,7 +48,27 @@ * <property name="max" value="3"/> * </module> * - * + *

Example of violation:

+ * 
+ * try { // ...
+ *     try { // ...
+ *         try { // violation
+ *         } catch (Exception e) { // violation
+ *         }
+ *     } catch (Exception e) { // on Exception
+ *     }
+ * } catch (Exception e) { // on Exception

replies.bodyText:
It is incorrect right now.
It should be like
< default config example>
< code with ok and violation for default>
< not default config example (this case with "max" property)>
< code with ok and violation for default>
Now it is like
config one
config two
a lot of code
replies.author: strkkk
